content:
As an AI language model, I do not have any affiliation with Encompass. However, based on research, Encompass, being a global organization that focuses on immigrant and refugee rights and social justice issues, recognizes the importance of cultural sensitivity, diversity, and overcoming language barriers when engaging with diverse communities.

Encompass offers language services to ensure effective communication with different communities, such as providing translations and interpretation services, including multilingual brochures, documents, and website content in multiple languages. Additionally, they hire staff who are proficient in different languages and have experience working within specific cultural settings.

Encompass also engages with community-based organizations and cultural ambassadors to better understand the cultural and linguistic nuances of the communities they serve. Through this, Encompass seeks to build trust and relationships with the diverse communities, which can help in overcoming communication challenges.

Furthermore, Encompass often conducts community forums, workshops, and community-led training to educate the immigrant and refugee communities on their rights and available resources in multiple languages, making them more accessible and understandable.

Overall, Encompass prioritizes culturally responsive and diverse engagement strategies, such as providing language access services, hiring multilingual staff, and engaging with community partners to ensure that they minimize or overcome communication barriers when engaging with diverse communities.
